title: Garfield Lasagna Party Directly Download
description:
32 mini-games to discover across emblematic environments such as Garfield’s house, the pizzeria, Liz’s veterinary clinic. Our friends Garfield , Odie, Arlene et Nermal have taken on an enormous challenge: to participate in a gigantic lasagna party g wide variety of crazy games are on the menu: throw snowballs, navigate obstacle courses, slice pizzas Anything to get ahead of your opponents: win the mini-games, roll the best dice throws and multiply the low blows by using objects Garfield Lasagna Party invites you to play a party game set in the world of everyone’s favorite fat orange cat. Tactics Ogre: Reborn
With 32 mini -games and 3 play modes, the fun never ends Designed for 4 players, this mode allows players to enjoy their favorite mini-games without having to pass all the squares on the game board: the perfect way to get in a quick game or for intensive training This game mode enables players to organize a championship with a selected number of mini-games, chosen randomly and played successively at high speed
